text: I know, that's why I'm confused - the documentation only shows the available filter (associationLabelFilter) but not how to add the association label for each individual item of the list as a column (propertyColumns)
Well it's a different component from the association table component, do you want to share your code?

Just tried both components: association pivot table has the downside of not showing any additional columns if I'm not mistaken. My use case is pulling the company field "Type" next to the name & association label.

Hi Lukas, the UI extensions are not yet supported for public apps. Are you an ecosystem partner with HubSpot? Can you tell me more about your app?

If you want to still distribute your extension across limited set of accounts, GitHub integration would be one way to do it today.
